short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds warnings to posts in the One Sentence Startup Pitches (OSSP) Facebook group if they are more than one sentence long.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds warnings to posts in the One Sentence Startup Pitches (OSSP) Facebook group if they are more than one sentence long (i.e. posts that aren't actually a one-sentence startup pitch).
